017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.Thread.MAX_PRIORITY;
021import static java.lang.Thread.MIN_PRIORITY;
022import static java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026
027import java.util.StringJoiner;
028import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
029import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
030import java.util.function.IntFunction;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.ThreadFactoryBuilder;
037
038/**
039 *  The implementation of
040 *  {@link ThreadFactoryBuilder}.
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.1.0
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $" )
049@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
050public final class ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl implements ThreadFactoryBuilder
051{
052        /*---------------*\
053    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
054        \*---------------*/
055    /**
056     *  The implementation of
057     *  {@link ThreadFactoryBuilder}.
058     *
059     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
060     *  @version $Id: ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $
061     *  @since 0.1.0
062     *
063     *  @UMLGraph.link
064     */
065    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $" )
066    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
067    private static final class ThreadFactoryImpl implements ThreadFactory
068    {
069            /*------------*\
070        ====** Attributes **===================================================
071            \*------------*/
072        /**
073         *  The context
074         *  {@link ClassLoader}
075         *  for the new threads. Can be {@code null}.
076         */
077        private final ClassLoader m_ContextClassLoader;
078
079        /**
080         *  If {@code true}, inherit initial values for inheritable
081         *  thread-locals from the constructing thread, otherwise no initial
082         *  values are inherited.
083         */
084        private final boolean m_InheritThreadLocals;
085
086        /**
087         *  {@code true} if the new threads are daemon thread, {@code false}
088         *  otherwise.
089         */
090        private final boolean m_IsDaemon;
091
092        /**
093         *  The counter for the thread name.
094         */
095        private final AtomicInteger m_NameCounter = new AtomicInteger( 0 );
096
097        /**
098         *  The factory method for the thread names.
099         */
100        private final IntFunction<String> m_NameFactory;
101
102        /**
103         *  The priority for the new threads. A value of -1 indicates that no
104         *  priority will be set explicitly.
105         */
106        private final int m_Priority;
107
108        /**
109         *  The desired stack size for the new threads, or zero to indicate
110         *  that this parameter is to be ignored.
111         */
112        private final long m_StackSize;
113
114        /**
115         *  The thread group for the new threads. Can be {@code null}.
116         */
117        private final ThreadGroup m_ThreadGroup;
118
119        /**
120         *  The uncaught exception handler for the new threads; can be
121         *  {@code null}.
122         */
123        private final UncaughtExceptionHandler m_UncaughtExceptionHandler;
124
125            /*--------------*\
126        ====** Constructors **=================================================
127            \*--------------*/
128        /**
129         *  Creates a new instance of {@code ThreadFactoryImpl}.
130         *
131         *  @param  nameFactory The factory method for the thread names.
132         *  @param  threadGroup The thread group for the new thread; can be
133         *      {@code null}.
134         *  @param  stackSize   The desired stack size for the new threads, or
135         *      zero to indicate that this parameter is to be ignored.
136         *  @param  inheritThreadLocals If {@code true}, inherit initial values
137         *      for inheritable thread-locals from the constructing thread,
138         *      otherwise no initial values are inherited.
139         *  @param  contextClassLoader  The context class loader for the new
140         *      threads; can be {@code null}.
141         *  @param  isDaemon    {@code true} if the new threads are daemon
142         *      threads, {@code false} otherwise.
143         *  @param  priority    The priority for the new threads. A value of -1
144         *      indicates that no priority will be set explicitly.
145         *  @param  uncaughtExceptionHandler    The handler for uncaught
146         *      exceptions for the new threads; can be {@code null}.
147         */
148        @SuppressWarnings( {"BooleanParameter", "ConstructorWithTooManyParameters"} )
149        public ThreadFactoryImpl( final IntFunction<String> nameFactory, final ThreadGroup threadGroup, final long stackSize, final boolean inheritThreadLocals, final ClassLoader contextClassLoader, final boolean isDaemon, final int priority, final UncaughtExceptionHandler uncaughtExceptionHandler )
150        {
151            m_NameFactory = requireNonNullArgument( nameFactory, "nameFactory" );
152            m_ThreadGroup = threadGroup;
153            m_StackSize = stackSize;
154            m_InheritThreadLocals = inheritThreadLocals;
155            m_ContextClassLoader = contextClassLoader;
156            m_IsDaemon = isDaemon;
157            m_Priority = priority;
158            m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = uncaughtExceptionHandler;
159        }   //  ThreadFactoryImpl()
160
161            /*---------*\
162        ====** Methods **======================================================
163            \*---------*/
164        /**
165         *  Returns the name for the new thread.
166         *
167         *  @return The new thread's name.
168         */
169        private final String generateName() { return m_NameFactory.apply( m_NameCounter.incrementAndGet() ); }
170
171        /**
172         *  {@inheritDoc}
173         */
174        @Override
175        public final Thread newThread( final Runnable target )
176        {
177            final var retValue = new Thread( m_ThreadGroup, target, generateName(), m_StackSize, m_InheritThreadLocals );
178            if( nonNull( m_ContextClassLoader ) ) retValue.setContextClassLoader( m_ContextClassLoader );
179            retValue.setDaemon( m_IsDaemon );
180            if( (MIN_PRIORITY <= m_Priority) && (m_Priority <= MAX_PRIORITY) ) retValue.setPriority( m_Priority );
181            if( nonNull( m_UncaughtExceptionHandler ) ) retValue.setUncaughtExceptionHandler( m_UncaughtExceptionHandler );
182
183            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
184            return retValue;
185        }   //  newThread()
186
187        /**
188         *  {@inheritDoc}
189         */
190        @Override
191        public final String toString()
192        {
193            final var buffer = new StringJoiner( ", ", "%s[".formatted(  getClass().getName() ), "]" )
194                .add( "ContextClassLoader='%s'".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_ContextClassLoader ) ) )
195                .add( "InheritThreadLocals=%b".formatted(  m_InheritThreadLocals ) )
196                .add( "IsDaemon=%b".formatted(  m_IsDaemon ) )
197                .add( "NameFactory='%s' (returns \"%s\")".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_NameFactory ), m_NameFactory.apply( 1 ) ) )
198                .add( "Priority=%d".formatted(  m_Priority ) )
199                .add( "StackSize=%d byte".formatted(  m_StackSize ) )
200                .add( "ThreadGroup='%s' (name: %s)".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_ThreadGroup ), nonNull( m_ThreadGroup ) ? m_ThreadGroup.getName() : "n/a" ) )
201                .add( "UncaughtExceptionHandler='%s'".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_UncaughtExceptionHandler ) ) );
202
203            //---* Compose the return value *--------------------------------------
204            final var retValue = buffer.toString();
205
206            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
207            return retValue;
208        }   //  toString()
209    }
210    //  class ThreadFactoryImpl
211
212        /*------------*\
213    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
214        \*------------*/
215    /**
216     *  The context
217     *  {@link ClassLoader}
218     *  for the new threads. The default is {@code null}.
219     */
220    private ClassLoader m_ContextClassLoader = null;
221
222    /**
223     *  If {@code true}, inherit initial values for inheritable
224     *  thread-locals from the constructing thread, otherwise no initial
225     *  values are inherited. The default is {@code true}.
226     */
227    private boolean m_InheritThreadLocals = true;
228
229    /**
230     *  {@code true} if the new threads are daemon thread, {@code false}
231     *  otherwise. The default is {@code false}.
232     */
233    private boolean m_IsDaemon = false;
234
235    /**
236     *  The factory method for the thread names. The default returns
237     *  &quot;{@code Thread-#}&quot;, where &quot;#&quot; stands for a counter.
238     */
239    private IntFunction<String> m_NameFactory = "Thread-%d"::formatted;
240
241    /**
242     *  The priority for the new threads. The default value of -1 indicates
243     *  that no priority will be set explicitly.
244     */
245    private int m_Priority = -1;
246
247    /**
248     *  The desired stack size for the new threads. The default value of zero
249     *  indicates that this parameter is to be ignored.
250     */
251    private long m_StackSize = 0;
252
253    /**
254     *  The thread group for the new threads. The default is {@code null}.
255     */
256    private ThreadGroup m_ThreadGroup = null;
257
258    /**
259     *  The uncaught exception handler for the new threads. The default is
260     *  {@code null}.
261     */
262    private UncaughtExceptionHandler m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = null;
263
264        /*--------------*\
265    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
266        \*--------------*/
267    /**
268     *  Creates a new instance of {@code ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl}.
269     */
270    public ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl() { /* Just exists */ }
271
272        /*---------*\
273    ====** Methods **==========================================================
274        \*---------*/
275    /**
276     *  {@inheritDoc}
277     */
278    @Override
279    public final ThreadFactory build()
280    {
281        final var retValue = new ThreadFactoryImpl( m_NameFactory, m_ThreadGroup, m_StackSize, m_InheritThreadLocals, m_ContextClassLoader, m_IsDaemon, m_Priority, m_UncaughtExceptionHandler );
282
283        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
284        return retValue;
285    }   //  build()
286
287    /**
288     *  {@inheritDoc}
289     */
290    @Override
291    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setContextClassLoader( final ClassLoader contextClassLoader )
292    {
293        m_ContextClassLoader = requireNonNullArgument( contextClassLoader, "contextClassLoader" );
294
295        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
296        return this;
297    }   //  setContextClassLoader()
298
299    /**
300     *  {@inheritDoc}
301     */
302    @Override
303    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setInheritThreadLocals( final boolean flag )
304    {
305        m_InheritThreadLocals = flag;
306
307        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
308        return this;
309    }   //  setInheritThreadLocals()
310
311    /**
312     *  {@inheritDoc}
313     */
314    @Override
315    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setDaemon( final boolean flag )
316    {
317        m_IsDaemon = flag;
318
319        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
320        return this;
321    }   //  setDaemon()
322
323    /**
324     *  {@inheritDoc}
325     */
326    @Override
327    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setNameFactory( final IntFunction<String> nameFactory )
328    {
329        m_NameFactory = requireNonNullArgument( nameFactory, "nameFactory" );
330
331        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
332        return this;
333    }   //  setNameFactory()
334
335    /**
336     *  {@inheritDoc}
337     */
338    @Override
339    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setPriority( final int priority ) throws ValidationException
340    {
341        if( (priority != -1) && !((MIN_PRIORITY <= priority) && (priority <= MAX_PRIORITY)) )
342        {
343            throw new ValidationException( "Priority value '%3$d' is invalid; it has to be -1, or in the range from %1$d to %2$d, included"
344                .formatted( MIN_PRIORITY, MAX_PRIORITY, priority ) );
345        }
346        m_Priority = priority;
347
348        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
349        return this;
350    }   //  setPriority()
351
352    /**
353     *  {@inheritDoc}
354     */
355    @Override
356    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setStackSize( final long stackSize )
357    {
358        if( stackSize < 0 ) throw new ValidationException( "stackSize is less than zero" );
359        m_StackSize = stackSize;
360
361        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
362        return this;
363    }   //  setStackSize()
364
365    /**
366     *  {@inheritDoc}
367     */
368    @Override
369    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setThreadGroup( final ThreadGroup threadGroup )
370    {
371        m_ThreadGroup = requireNonNullArgument( threadGroup, "threadGroup" );
372
373        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
374        return this;
375    }   //  setThreadGroup()
376
377    /**
378     *  {@inheritDoc}
379     */
380    @Override
381    public final ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl setUncaughtExceptionHandler( final UncaughtExceptionHandler uncaughtExceptionHandler )
382    {
383        m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = requireNonNullArgument( uncaughtExceptionHandler, "uncaughtExceptionHandler" );
384
385        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
386        return this;
387    }   //  setUncaughtExceptionHandler()
388
389    /**
390     *  {@inheritDoc}
391     */
392    @Override
393    public final String toString()
394    {
395        final var buffer = new StringJoiner( ", ", "%s[".formatted(  getClass().getName() ), "]" )
396            .add( "ContextClassLoader='%s'".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_ContextClassLoader ) ) )
397            .add( "InheritThreadLocals=%b".formatted(  m_InheritThreadLocals ) )
398            .add( "IsDaemon=%b".formatted(  m_IsDaemon ) )
399            .add( "NameFactory='%s' (returns \"%s\")".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_NameFactory ), m_NameFactory.apply( 1 ) ) )
400            .add( "Priority=%d".formatted(  m_Priority ) )
401            .add( "StackSize=%d byte".formatted(  m_StackSize ) )
402            .add( "ThreadGroup='%s' (name: %s)".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_ThreadGroup ), nonNull( m_ThreadGroup ) ? m_ThreadGroup.getName() : "n/a" ) )
403            .add( "UncaughtExceptionHandler='%s'".formatted(  Objects.toString( m_UncaughtExceptionHandler ) ) );
404
405        //---* Compose the return value *--------------------------------------
406        final var retValue = buffer.toString();
407
408        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
409        return retValue;
410    }   //  toString()
411}
412//  class ThreadFactoryBuilderImpl
413

415 *  End of File
